verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Beautiful holiness! theme of the Bible, Filling my heart with its riches of grace; Cleansing and keeping me ever from evil, Fitting my soul for that heavenly place.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Beautiful holiness! fair as the morning, Sparkling with jewels of purity bright; Rubies of grace in their splendid adorning, Cover me here as I walk in the light.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Beautiful holiness! coming from heaven, Likeness of God and the angels above; Jesus, the way, and the Bible, are given— Wonderful favor through infinite love!

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Beautiful holiness! blissful, eternal, Surely without it no man seeth God; It will prepare us for glories immortal— This is the way our dear Savior hath trod.
